original_text: So there were eight tables on which they killed animals for sacrifices. Four tables were in the yard outside the entrance. Four tables were inside the entrance room.
korean_text: 문 곁 이쪽에 상이 넷이 있고 저쪽에 상이 넷이 있어 상이 모두 여덟 개라 그 위에서 희생제물을 잡았더라

sentences.original_text: on which they killed animals for sacrifices
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에서 그들은 제물을 위한 동물을 죽였다

sentences.original_text: Four tables were in the yard
Four tables were inside the entrance room
sentences.korean_translation: 네 개의 테이블은 입구 방 안에 있었다
